dict.string: In order to show yourself, please accept the camera permission
In order to speak in the conferences, please accept the microphone permission

In order to be able to check the environmental information which will lead to a better user experience, having access to motion information will help pre-determined the best in app behaviour for the audio and video quality
Granting us the location while you use this app will help make sure that we can tune and configure the room's quality wherever you are. Not granting this will still give you access to the features

In order to integrate your bluetooth's surrounding and bluetooth capable devices with room's connectivity, we need your permission to have access to them. Without this permission, you'll still be able to use the app.
